helpIcon: To have individual components of MAChINE explained to you, click on the <1 /> icon on the top right and then hover over the respective component with your mouse. To turn the explanations off, simply click on the button again.

aimat.name: AiMat
aimat.description:
The AiMat (Artificial Intelligence for Materials sciences) group
              of KIT develops AI and machine learning solutions for the
              materials sciences.

msg.name: Medium-sized Geckos
msg.description: This application was created by the "Medium-sized Geckos" group, which consists mostly of members of the freshman orientation group "Team Gecko".

molele.dontKnow: Don't know how to get started?

configure.label: Configure
configure.description: Configure custom machine learning models to predict properties of molecules

train.label: Train
train.description: Train your custom models and watch them learn

draw.label: Draw
draw.description: Draw any molecule imaginable and preview it in 3D

analyze.label: Analyze
analyze.description: Analyze your molecules for various properties with the models you trained

compare.label: Compare
compare.description: Compare your molecules and models to other users' creations
